metadata.name: Bulk Deletion Changes To Privileged Account Permissions
metadata.comment: Detects when a user is removed from a privileged role. Bulk changes should be investigated.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('6') AND (lower(LOWER(message)) in ('remove eligible member (permanent)', 'remove eligible member (eligible)')))

output.summary: Detects when a user is removed from a privileged role. Bulk changes should be investigated.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legtimate administrator actions of removing members from a role Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-identity-management#azure-ad-roles-assignment
